images.title: 선형 6성분 시각화 (Translation/Rotation/Magnification)
images.description: 웨이퍼 위의 Overlay 벡터맵으로 6가지 선형 성분의 효과를 각각 시각화. Translation(균일 이동), Rotation(회전), Magnification(배율)이 웨이퍼 각 위치에서 어떤 방향/크기의 Overlay를 만드는지.

spec.prompt: A 2x3 grid of circular wafer diagrams showing the six linear overlay error components as vector arrow maps. Top row, left to right: (1) 'Translation X (Tx)' - all arrows pointing uniformly to the right; (2) 'Translation Y (Ty)' - all arrows pointing uniformly upward; (3) 'Rotation (R)' - arrows forming a circular/tangential pattern around the wafer center, clockwise or counterclockwise. Bottom row: (4) 'Magnification X (Mx)' - arrows pointing outward along X axis, larger at edges; (5) 'Magnification Y (My)' - arrows pointing outward along Y axis, larger at edges; (6) 'Combined (all 6 terms)' - a complex pattern combining all effects. Each wafer is shown as a gray circle with a notch. Arrow length proportional to overlay magnitude. Blue arrows for small, red for large. Clean technical illustration with white background.

images.title: 선형 vs 고차 vs AI 모델 잔차 비교
images.description: Overlay 보정 모델의 정밀도 비교. 6par(선형) → HOWA(고차 다항식) → AI(ML 모델) 순으로 잔차(Residual)가 줄어드는 것을 웨이퍼 맵과 통계량으로 비교.
